title: How much do I actually have to write for the common app essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: https://appsupport.commonapp.org/applicantsupport/s/article/What-are-the-2018-2019-Common-Application-essay-prompts-App gives you complete information. Also, view articles on the right side panel. You can assume you will have to write 3–4 common essay applications, each of which will be about 350+ words. You will have guidelines and restrictions not to cross beyond the limit (I am unable to find the current year’s limits). Besides, if you are applying to top tier colleges, they will have additional writing / supplemental questions (links on blogs guiding on these aspects are there in the above link), each of which may be around 200+ words. You will have 3–5 such responses. The 2018 Length Limit for the Common Application Essay will help you further.
